fip.text: Symbol of the Government of Canada
fip.label: Government of Canada homepage

home.description: Welcome to GCForms super duper one stop shop for login

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.description: Select the account you want to use.

start.title: Start Login
start.welcome: Welcome to GCForm's amazing new login solution

form.label: User Name
form.description: Must be a federal government email address.

password.title: Password
password.description: Please enter your password or select a different account below

complexity.length: Must be at least {minLength} characters long.

verify.title: Verify your identity
verify.description: Choose one of the following factors.
verify.noResults: No second factors available to setup.

otp.title: One Time Code
otp.otpDescription: Please enter the code from your authenticator device
otp.smsDescription: Please enter the code received by text message
otp.emailDescription: Please enter the code received by email

error.title: Error
error.description: An error occurred while trying to sign in.

logout.title: Logout
logout.description: Click an account to end the session

disabled.title: Registration disabled
disabled.description: The registration is disabled. Please contact your administrator.

missingdata.title: Missing data
missingdata.description: Provide email, first and last name to register.

register.title: Register
register.noMethodAvailableWarning: No authentication method available. Please contact your administrator.
register.selectMethod: Select the method you would like to authenticate
register.agreeTo: To register you must agree to the terms and conditions

password.title: Set Password
password.description: Set the password for your account

required.password: You have to provide a password!

errors.userNotFound: User not found in the system
errors.couldNotLinkIDP: Could not link IDP to user
